questions.question: Hybrid cars can run solely on electric power
questions.actual: Hybrid cars use a combination of electric and gasoline power, but they cannot run solely on electric power.

questions.question: The Eiffel Tower was once used as a giant advertising billboard for CitroÃ«n car
Brake fluid is typically clear or pale yellow
All convertibles have soft tops
questions.actual: Some convertibles have retractable hardtops, which are made of metal

questions.question: The battery in a modern car is charged by an alternator
Electric cars require oil changes
questions.actual: Eectric cars do not have internal combustion engines and, therefore, do not require oil changes

questions.question: A V6 engine has more cylinders than a V8 engine
questions.actual: A V6 engine has fewer cylinders (6) compared to a V8 engine (8)

questions.question: The Ford Model T was the first mass-produced car in the world
All-wheel drive (AWD) and four-wheel drive (4WD) are the same thing
questions.actual: AWD is typically always active, while 4WD can often be manually engaged or disengaged
